text: Jihare loka apani'am patani'am nala zihara karana ate phira usa tom' piche hata jana, jihara unham ne kiha si, tam ika garadana (gulama) nu azada karana hai. Isa tom pahilam ki uha apisa vica (ika duje nu) hatha la'una. Isa nala tuhanu sikhi'a diti jandi hai ate alaha janada hai jo kujha tusim karade ho
